import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import Loader from 'react-loaders' import AnimatedLetters from '../AnimatedLetters' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import './index.scss' const Experience = () => { const [letterClass, setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate') useEffect(() => { const timer = setTimeout(() => { setLetterClass('text-animate-hover') }, 3000) return () => clearTimeout(timer) // This is the cleanup function }, []) return ( <>

Mountain View

Check out all of these gorgeous mountain trips with beautiful views of, you guessed it, the mountains

To The Beach

Plan your next beach trip with these fabulous destinations

Desert Destinations

It's the desert you've always dreamed of

Explore The Galaxy

Seriously, straight up, just blast off into outer space today

) } export default Experience
